# {{lb|zh|phonetic}} [[w:erhua|erhua]] ([[retroflex]] final "r")

===Usage notes===
A prominent feature of northern Mandarin, it is represented by the character {{zh-l|兒}}, but is not a syllable.
* ending in -i, -n: left out
*: {{zh-l|一塊兒}} yīkuàir &mdash; yīkuàr
*: {{zh-l|慢慢兒}} mànmàn ér &mdash; mànmàr
*: {{zh-l|根兒}} gēn ér &mdash; gēr

* ending in -ng: left out and nasalized
*: {{zh-l|有空兒}} yǒukòng ér &mdash; yǒukõr
